name: Gaz'Z Episode 1 - Underground
description:
Gaz'Z

it's a 2D platform game, a survival horror game in the present day. It's an a hardcore game!

Helped the main character to survive in this zombies world.  And escaped a toxic and fatal Gaz!

You have two modes of gameplay, "Normal" and  "Hardcore"!

Normal Mode : shows you how the game work, it's like the easy mode.

Hardcore Mode : gives you more challenges and more new zombies kind!

Don't waste your bullets!

Good Luck and Enjoy!
